question: Which among the following was the theme of the Global Aviation Summit 2019?
option3: Flying for all-especially the next 6 Billion
answer: Flying for all-especially the next 6 Billion
explanation: Global Aviation Summit 2019 was organized in Mumbai, Maharashtra which was inaugurated by the Union Minister for Commerce & Industry and Civil Aviation, Shri Suresh Prabhu. The theme of the event was "Flying for all-especially the next 6 Billion".
